about_the_game:
Barraka is a fascinating claymation adventure game that will arouse your curiosity and take you into a world full of puzzles and surprises. Get ready to join our brave heroine in an exciting exploration of the spooky fair of a small town, where every corner holds secrets to be discovered.

Join Ainhoa on her thrilling adventure through a mysterious village fair set in the 90's! This amazing journey will be filled with exploration, puzzles and surprises, from her mother's warm churro stand to the epic showdown with the wicked witch and her minions. As you collect coins and progress through this magical and fascinating amusement park, you will encounter new levels, challenges, huts and mini-games. Barraka's incredible world has been meticulously created by hand with plasticine and animated using the stop motion technique.

Get ready to meet and help unforgettable characters while facing colorful enemies that will make you laugh your head off. Visit the haunted house, explore a mysterious mini-circus, ride the bumper cars or enjoy a merry-go-round that transforms into a horizontal scrolling space shooter with a boss ending. Every corner of the Barraka fair has surprises that are as fun as they are challenging!

Don't miss this opportunity and join us in this incredible plasticine adventure!

Features:

  • Beautifully crafted graphics that combines real images, stop motion and traditional animation to recreate an amazing plasticine universe.

  • A magical world where lovable characters and disturbing enemies coexist.

  • Enjoy unforgettable attractions: the bumper cars, the merry-go-round, the haunted house and much more.

  • Have fun with classic mini-games that will test your skills such as mole smashing or target shooting.

  • Buy new equipment and upgrade it to help Ainhoa progress in her adventure and discover all the secrets of the mysterious amusement park.

  • Get caught by its ambient soundtrack and its hilarious sound effects.

name: Barraka

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD® FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Barraka is a claymation adventure game filled with puzzles and surprises. Join our brave heroine as she explores a spooky fair, encountering unique characters and challenges. Enjoy bumper cars, whack-a-mole, the haunted house, a mini circus, and more.
